nodes.bodyText: We could make this into URL url = new URL("platform:/plugin/" + FRAGMENT_ID + resourcePath);
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,7 +37,6 @@ public static InputStream getResourceContentAsString(String resourcePath) throws
 		URL url;

nodes.bodyText: We use _ for separating single words in constant names. So NUMBEROFINTERFACES should be NUMBER_OF_INTERFACES.

nodes.bodyText: Tabs/spaces inconsistency. I think we decided on using spaces a while time ago, so let's at least not change it back to tabs.
I think we will get the error message printed anyways because we are passing the exception.
Let's maybe rename it to elementDefinition instead of aBeanSei?
I think the error message will be printed anyways, so we can remove it from our message.
Looks like there is a wrong line ending here, let's fix it
